entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
